languages.text: "Избавляемся от препятствий на пути официального расследования". {n}На каменном лице нет ни намека на улыбку.{/n} "Я прибыл с отрядом для расследования пропажи крайне ценного судна, но в процессе нас отвлекает мятежное отребье. Приходится попутно заниматься им".

"Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."
languages.original_text: "Избавляемся от препятствий на пути официального расследования". {n}На каменном лице нет ни намека на улыбку.{/n} "Я прибыл с отрядом для расследования пропажи крайне ценного судна, но в процессе нас отвлекает мятежное отребье. Приходится попутно заниматься им".

traits.locale_text: "Taking out the rubbish." {n}There is not even a hint of a smile on his face.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now we are having to deal with them too."

"Taking out the rubbish." {n}There is not even a hint of a smile on his face.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now we are having to deal with them too."

"Taking out the rubbish." {n}There is not even a hint of a smile on his face.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

"Taking out the rubbish." {n}There is not even a hint of a smile on his face.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

"Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

"Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

languages.text: "Wir entfernen Hindernisse einer offiziellen Untersuchung", {n}sagt der Proktor ohne einen Anflug von Ironie.{/n} "Ich kam mit meiner Einheit hierher, um das Verschwinden eines besonders wertvollen Schiffs zu untersuchen, aber dann kam uns dieses meuternde Gesindel in die Quere. Jetzt müssen wir uns auch mit ihnen befassen."
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

traits.locale_text: "Wir entfernen Hindernisse einer offiziellen Untersuchung", {n}sagt der Proktor ohne einen Anflug von Ironie.{/n} "Ich kam mit meiner Einheit hierher, um das Verschwinden eines besonders wertvollen Schiffs zu untersuchen, aber dann kam uns dieses meuternde Gesindel in die Quere. Jetzt müssen wir uns auch mit ihnen befassen."

languages.text: « Nous retirons les obstacles qui gênent une enquête officielle, {n}explique le proctor sans la moindre trace d'ironie.{/n} Mon unité et moi sommes ici pour enquêter sur la disparition d'un vaisseau particulièrement précieux, mais la vermine insurgée s'est mise en travers de notre route. Nous devons donc nous en occuper aussi. »
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

traits.locale_text: « Nous retirons les obstacles qui gênent une enquête officielle, {n}explique le proctor sans la moindre trace d'ironie.{/n} Mon unité et moi sommes ici pour enquêter sur la disparition d'un vaisseau particulièrement précieux, mais la vermine insurgée s'est mise en travers de notre route. Nous devons donc nous en occuper aussi. »

languages.text: «Despejar el camino para una investigación oficial», {n}dice el Procurador sin el más mínimo atisbo de ironía.{/n} «Mi unidad y yo hemos venido para investigar la desaparición de una nave especialmente valiosa, pero la escoria amotinada se ha interpuesto en nuestro camino. Y ahora vamos a tener que ocuparnos también de ellos».
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

traits.locale_text: «Despejar el camino para una investigación oficial», {n}dice el Procurador sin el más mínimo atisbo de ironía.{/n} «Mi unidad y yo hemos venido para investigar la desaparición de una nave especialmente valiosa, pero la escoria amotinada se ha interpuesto en nuestro camino. Y ahora vamos a tener que ocuparnos también de ellos».

languages.text: “清理阻碍正式调查的障碍。”{n}索罗蒙开了口，没有一丝开玩笑的意思。{/n}“我和我的小队来到这里，调查某艘重要舰船的失踪事件，但那群该死的叛乱分子打算阻挠我们。现在，我们得把他们一起处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

traits.locale_text: “清理阻碍正式调查的障碍。”{n}索罗蒙开了口，没有一丝开玩笑的意思。{/n}“我和我的小队来到这里，调查某艘重要舰船的失踪事件，但那群该死的叛乱分子打算阻挠我们。现在，我们得把他们一起处理掉。”

languages.text: 「公式調査の障害物を排除しています」{n}代理人は皮肉のかけらも見せずに言った。{/n}「私と部隊は、ある極めて貴重な船の失踪を調査するためにここへ来ました。ですが、反乱者どもが邪魔をしてきたんです。今は、そいつらの相手までしなければならなくなっています」
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."

traits.locale_text: 「公式調査の障害物を排除しています」{n}代理人は皮肉のかけらも見せずに言った。{/n}「私と部隊は、ある極めて貴重な船の失踪を調査するためにここへ来ました。ですが、反乱者どもが邪魔をしてきたんです。今は、そいつらの相手までしなければならなくなっています」

languages.text: "Resmî bir soruşturmanın önündeki engelleri kaldırıyoruz." {n}Üsteğmen, yüzünde en ufak bir ironi belirtisi olmadan konuşuyor.{/n} "Birimimle, kaybolan değerli bir gemiyi araştırmaya gelmiştik ama yolumuza aşağılık isyancılar çıktı. Bir de bunlarla uğraşmak zorunda kaldık."
languages.original_text: "Removing obstructions to an official enquiry," {n}the Proctor says without a hint of irony in his expression.{/n} "My unit and I came here to investigate the disappearance of one particularly valuable ship, but the mutinous scum got in the way. Now, we are having to deal with them too."
